value.name: Officer on Trial: A Q&A With Messina Madson
value.description: Now in private practice, she has defended police officers in shooting cases, most recently winning an acquittal on behalf of former Dallas police officer Christopher Hess, who was charged in the 2017 shooting death of 21-year-old Genevive Dawes.
